The advisory assumes this profile to tweet the president's speech at the inauguration of the submarine construction site in Itaguaí.
RT @blogplanalto: #AoVivo - President Dilma addresses the inauguration of the submarine construction site: http://t.co/JXLCjV...
'Figures #CPB good news, but our goal is not to present abstract figures, but to realize concrete results' (1/2)
'This means more jobs & a rise in purchasing power. That is why we keep the course with putting public finances in order and implement reforms' (2/2).
Full statement press conference after the end of the weekly #ministerraad: http://t.co/wfTvXn7ywL
This shipyard is another step to make the Itaguaí Naval Complex a technological and industrial pole relevant to the development. of our country.
Here the systems will be integrated and our submarines and components will be finished here. #Prosub
The reactor will be installed, the propulsion equipment will be installed and this will be a central element of this process. #Prosub
The grandeur of this building can be summarized in a single data: in it it will be possible to construct two submarines simultaneously. #Prosub
We arrived here thanks to the Navy's competence, the speedy execution, the dedication of our workers, the expertise of the companies. #Prosub
In an ever closer future, the Brazilian Naval Force may write another achievement for its history. #Prosub
Brazil is a peaceful country and will continue to do so. This, however, does not mean neglecting our defense. #Prosub
It is essential to have a modern navy, well equipped, and with well-trained personnel to guarantee the sovereignty of our country.
From a demand to strengthen the capacity of our Navy, we are producing + technology, innovation and development. industrial.
Producing + quality jobs in Brazil is a commitment that we should have with our population. #Prosub
I thank the workers who dedicate their best efforts to the construction of a work so important to our country. #Prosub
On the eve of #DiaDoMarinheiro, it is an honor to declare inaugurated + a step for a prosperous, just and sovereign Brazil that we are building.
